'''The Chalk Prince and the Dragon''' is a [[Flagship Event]] in [[Version 1.2]].

{{Quote|If not for [[Sucrose]], no one would have known that [[Albedo]] is hiding a great secret &mdash; one that involves a   mysterious unknown sword and a mountain entombed in ice for millennia...   Onwards and upwards, Traveler! In spite of the bitter cold...}}

{{Description|Everything was proceeding smoothly, until the unexpected happened... Your adventure across [[Dragonspine]] begins!}}

==Summary and Requirements==
Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 20 and complete the [[For a Tomorrow Without Tears|Archon Quest Prologue: Act II - For a Tomorrow Without Tears]], as well as [[Albedo]]'s Story Quest [[Princeps Cretaceus Chapter]]: [[Traveler Observation Report]] to access the event '''The Chalk Prince and the Dragon'''.

During the event's duration, the Princeps Cretaceus Chapter will require Adventure Rank 20 or above. The requirements will be increased after the event ends.

==Event Phases==
Completing all quests in each of the first three Acts will unlock one of Festering Desire's special abilities each time.

The amount of Essences gained from challenges will scale based on Travelers' World Levels.

===Act I - Festering Desire===
Complete '''The Chalk Prince and the Dragon''' storyline to obtain the event-exclusive weapon [[Festering Desire]].<br />
Collect {{Item|Rime-Worn Fragment|30}}, {{Item|Rime-Worn Crystal|30}}, and complete the related quests to obtain [[Primogems]], [[Mora]], and other rewards.

====Tutorial====
[[File:Tutorial Frostborn Miracle 1.png|200px|thumb|left]]Use Scarlet Quartzes to {{Color|buzzword|lessen the effects of Sheer Cold}}. It might be the key to completing certain challenges. Scarlet Quartzes may be generated by some monsters defeated during challenges...
{{Clr}}
[[File:Tutorial Frostborn Miracle 2.png|200px|thumb|left]]Besides this, you can use the attacks of {{Color|buzzword|Scarlet Quartzes}} to quickly shatter the Frost Thorns around the Cryo Regisvine's shield to break the shield.
{{Clr}}
[[File:Tutorial Frostborn Miracle 3.png|200px|thumb|left]]This strange ridge of ice is known as a Seed of Winter. Break it to create {{Color|buzzword|a shield that can block attacks}}. Use this shield to stand against the special AoE attacks of the Cryo Regisvine.
{{Clr}}

==Festering Desire==
New 4 Star event-exclusive weapon, [[Festering Desire]] {{Card|Festering Desire|Lv. 1|type=Weapon|rarity=4|refinement=5|stars=1}}
*The special weapon effects will only take effect in the [[Dragonspine]] area of the open world, and will not take effect in [[Domains]].
*Enhancing [[Festering Desire]] during the event period yields a 1.5× Weapon Enhancement EXP Bonus.
===Abilities===
[[File:The_Chalk_Prince_and_the_Dragon_Weapon.jpg|thumb|right|250px]]
*The character who equips this weapon during the event will deal 60% more DMG to opponents in the Dragonspine region.
*The character who equips this weapon during the event will accumulate Sheer Cold at a slower rate, 0.66%/s (maxes out in 2m 30s, or 150s, as compared to the usual 100s). This effect stacks subtractively with Delicious Goulash, resulting in an even slower rate, 0.17%/s (maxes out in 9m 49s or 589s) (Formula: rate of 1%/s -0.5 -0.33). They also gain 35% extra CRIT Rate against opponents in the Dragonspine region.
*The character who equips this weapon during the event gains 50% extra DMG dealt via Scarlet Quartzes. They also deal 70% additional CRIT DMG to opponents in the Dragonspine Region.
{{Clr}}
